gui.hardcorerevival.wait_for_rescue: Wait to be rescued or accept your fate.
config.hardcorerevival.secondsUntilDeath: The time in seconds in which a player can still be rescued from death. Set to 0 to disable the timer.
config.hardcorerevival.continueTimerWhil: If true, the timer until death continues even if the player logs out.
config.hardcorerevival.consecutiveKnocko: The threshold of seconds that knockout will be treated as a consecutive knockout. See resumeTimerOnConsecutiveKnockout and multiplyTimerOnConsecutiveKnockout.
config.hardcorerevival.resumeTimerOnCons: If true, the timer until death resumes from its last time on consecutive knockouts.
config.hardcorerevival.multiplyTimerOnCo: The multiplier to apply to the time remaining on consecutive knockouts.
config.hardcorerevival.rescueDistance.to: The distance at which a player can rescue another.
config.hardcorerevival.rescueActionTicks: The time in ticks it takes to rescue a player. 20 ticks are one second.
config.hardcorerevival.rescueRespawnHeal: The amount of health to respawn with when a player was rescued, out of 20.
config.hardcorerevival.rescueRespawnFood: The food level to respawn with when a player was rescued, out of 20.
config.hardcorerevival.rescueRespawnEffe: Effects applied to a player when rescued, in the format "effect|duration|amplifier"
config.hardcorerevival.glowOnKnockout.to: If true, knocked out players will glow, making them visible through blocks.
config.hardcorerevival.allowCommands.too: If true, knocked out players are still able to run commands. OPs are always able to run commands.
config.hardcorerevival.allowUnarmedMelee: If true, knocked out players are still able to punch nearby enemies.
config.hardcorerevival.allowBows.tooltip: If true, knocked out players are still able to fire bows.
config.hardcorerevival.allowPistols.tool: If true, knocked out players are still able to fire pistols from Mr Crayfish's Gun Mod.
commands.disabled_when_knocked_out: You cannot use commands while knocked out.
